alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 15 at 1:51PM PDT until June 16 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of Elko County. White Pine, Southern Lander, and Southern Eureka counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
